content:
I think there may be a problem here. You mentioned earlier that you're preparing for an open track day at VIR on April 24th, but now you're mentioning a "Track Day Frenzy" event on May 15th.

Just to clarify, have you double-checked the dates and event details to ensure you're preparing for the correct event? It's essential to confirm the event schedule, as it may impact your preparation and planning.

Additionally, if you're looking to dial in your car's new suspension setup, it's a great idea to consider getting some professional guidance or consulting with a qualified mechanic or suspension expert. They can help you fine-tune your setup to optimize your car's performance and handling on the track.

Remember to also review VIR's specific rules and regulations for the event you're participating in, as they may have specific requirements or restrictions for suspension modifications.

Let me know if you have any further questions or concerns, and I'll do my best to assist you!
